amendment.description: To require the National Railroad Passenger Corporation to grant a discount to members of the public benefit corporation Veterans Advantage.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3677 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3677 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Blumenthal to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5503) To require the National Railroad Passenger Corporation to grant a discount to members of the public benefit corporation Veterans Advantage.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3677 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Blumenthal to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3677 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
